item.description:
Have you ever been to Rasoi?

It's a fantastic Indian restaurant that offers many gluten-free dishes, Vegan buffets on Saturdays, and Vegetarian buffets on Sundays.

The owner, Sanjiv Dhar, is trying a special new vegetarian meal in August that may interest you. Please let me know if your group is interested in meeting there and I'll arrange to have something a little extra special for you.

Below are the details.

Every evening from 5:30pm-9pm in August (beginning August 3, 2009) Rasoi Indian Restaurant (727 East Ave, Pawtucket, RI) will offer a pre-set Ayurvedic Thali (meal) for $14.99.

Ayurveda is a 5000-year-old tradition that teaches that energetic forces (doshas) in one’s body suggests what food one should eat.

After extensive study of Ayurvedic writings, Chef Sanjiv Dhar carefully chose this August meal offering by balancing the concepts of air, earth, water, and fire in the body with superb taste. Each item is served in small katoris (bowls) within a large Thali (round platter).

• Homemade yogurt sweetened with honey and banana

• Diced potatoes and fresh eggplant, cooked in an ayurvedic masala of ginger and garlic.

• Cauliflower, carrots, and green peas cooked with coconut and a mustard seed tempering.

• Homemade cheese covered in fresh beet root.

• Saffron rice

• Sour lentils

• Triangular pan friend bread

• Sweat and spicy mango chutney

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Try an Ayurvedic Thali Meal!!
